mapper.select: SELECT PRBL_NUM , PRBL_CNTN , QUES1 , QUES2 , QUES3 , QUES4 , ANS , CTY , LT_NUM FROM PRBL WHERE LT_NUM = #{ltNum} ORDER BY PRBL_NUM DESC
SELECT PRBL_NUM , PRBL_CNTN , QUES1 , QUES2 , QUES3 , QUES4 , ANS , CTY , LT_NUM FROM PRBL WHERE PRBL_NUM = #{prblNum}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM APPLEXAM_DETAIL WHERE APPLEXAM_NUM = (SELECT APPLEXAM_NUM FROM APPLEXAM WHERE MEM_NUM = #{memNum} AND LT_NUM = #{ltNum})
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO APPLEXAM_DETAIL (PRBL_NUM, PRBL_ORD_NUM, APPLEXAM_NUM) select A.PRBL_NUM, RANK() OVER(ORDER BY A.PRBL_NUM DESC) , #{applexamNum} FROM ( SELECT * from PRBL order by DBMS_RANDOM.RANDOM ) A WHERE ROWNUM < 11
mapper.select: SELECT a.ANSWER , a.APPLEXAM_NUM , a.PRBL_NUM , a.PRBL_ORD_NUM , a.MRK_RSLT , p.PRBL_CNTN , p.QUES1 , p.QUES2 , p.QUES3 , p.QUES4 , p.ANS , p.CTY , p.LT_NUM FROM APPLEXAM_DETAIL a JOIN PRBL p ON a.PRBL_NUM = p.PRBL_NUM WHERE APPLEXAM_NUM = #{applexamNum} ORDER BY PRBL_ORD_NUM
mapper.update: UPDATE APPLEXAM_DETAIL SET MRK_RSLT = CASE WHEN #{answer} = (SELECT ANS FROM PRBL WHERE PRBL_NUM = #{prblNum}) THEN 1 WHEN #{answer} <> (SELECT ANS FROM PRBL WHERE PRBL_NUM = #{prblNum}) THEN 0 END WHERE PRBL_NUM = #{prblNum} AND APPLEXAM_NUM = #{applexamNum}
